properties.entry: INSERT INTO P_ORDER ( ORDER_NO , MEMBER_NO , PRODUCT_NO , ORDER_NAME , ORDER_ADDRESS , ORDER_PHONE , ORDER_REQ , ORDER_DELIVERY ) VALUES ( SEQ_ORDER.NEXTVAL , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , 3000 )
